front.title: Support for RSVP in Layer 3 VPNs

abstract.t: RFC 4364 and RFC 4659 define an approach to building provider-provisioned Layer 3 VPNs for IPv4 and IPv6. It may be desirable touse RSVP to perform admission control on the links between CE and PErouters. This document specifies procedures by which RSVP messagestravelling from CE to CE across an L3VPN may be appropriately handledby PE routers so that admission control can be performed on PE-CElinks. Optionally, admission control across the provider's backbonemay also be supported.
